text: E garima, gumazir maba, fofoziba ko nɨghnɨzir aghuim ikia egha uan fofozir kam ko nɨghnɨzir aghuir kam sara ingara biziba deragha dagh amua, bizir bar avɨriba isi. Egha me gɨn ariaghirezɨ, gumazir igharaziba pura men biziba isi, me men mɨn fofozir kamagh gariba itir puvatɨ. Arazir kam a derazir puvatɨ, egha uaghan an mɨngarim aven modozɨ e a gɨfozir puvatɨgha okam nɨghnɨsi.
